page.title: 20CONCLUSION
page.content: Our "patch" is mainly residential, Conservative,very private - part of the "back woods" of Surrey.House prices range from Â£45,000 for a 2 bed- room,terrace house to over Â£120,000 for a four bedroom,executive house. There is some withdrawal of children from the state education system.Other- wise the area is completely comprehen- sive and its schools obtain good results.At Collingwood in 1984 34.3% of the whole 5th year gained 5 or more 'O' level or equivalent passes.Occup- ations are mainly managerial,profess- ional and electrical engineering,with a strong attachment to Heathrow.The economic recession has had less impact here as new electrical and computer industries are thriving.There is popu- lation movement into the area and government plans for a further 20,000 houses in Surrey Heath by 2,000 AD.
